name: Google 2011 Clean
description:
Removes all of the clutter that has accumulated on Google over the years and restyles the top bar to be clear.  Also removes extra padding on the left to allow for low resolution monitors and Aero Snap.

I've pretty much abandoned this for now, please try FTD's spin-off Google Clean 2012: http://userstyles.org/styles/61134/google-clean-2012
additional_info:
* To disable Google instant:

- Use this search plugin: http://mycroft.mozdev.org/search-engines.html?name=google+no+instant

- And this one for Google Images Classic: http://mycroft.mozdev.org/search-engines.html?name=google+images+classic

- Set "keyword.URL" to this in about:config (remove spaces):
http ://www. google. com/search?complete=0&ie=UTF-8&sourceid=navclient&gfns=1&q=

- Set this as your Homepage under Options > General (remove spaces):
http ://www. google. com/webhp?complete=0

* Recent update Oct 6: Fixes some changes that slipped in, fixes menu transparency, kills the Google+ button, expands styles to Video and Maps.
